query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_preferences (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  email_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  email_address VARCHAR(255),
  telegram_enabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  telegram_chat_id VARCHAR(100),
  push_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  severity_filter ENUM('all', 'warning_up', 'critical_only') DEFAULT 'warning_up' NOT NULL,
  quiet_hours_enabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  quiet_hours_start VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '22:00',
  quiet_hours_end VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '07:00',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_notification_user (user_id)
);

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  email_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  email_address VARCHAR(255),
  telegram_enabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  telegram_chat_id VARCHAR(100),
  push_enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  severity_filter ENUM('all', 'warning_up', 'critical_only') DEFAULT 'warning_up' NOT NULL,
  quiet_hours_enabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  quiet_hours_start VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '22:00',
  quiet_hours_end VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '07:00',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_notification_user (user_id)
);
